title: Famous Film Locations
name: Famous Film Locations
description:
A Map by Barnaclebarnes

Famous places on film. The original list is from Mark Allen and was posted to his blog at http://blog.wfmu.org/freeform/2006/02/using_google_ea.html

properties.name: American Pie house
properties.description: Posted by Marym 4153 Cedar Drive, Long Beach, CAThis is Jim\'s home, where he sets up the camera to film Nadia undressing. Zestimate = ,191,359

properties.name: Batman Movie House
properties.description: Posted by Marym  160 S San Rafael Ave, Pasadena, CA 91105 Stately Wayne Manor from the Batman movies, starring Michael Keaton and Val Kilmer. Adam West lived down the street at 380 San Rafael Zestimate = ,189,494

properties.name: Character gets hit by fire truck in Enemy of the State
properties.description: Posted by Awisemanhillyer pl nw & connecticut ave nw washington dcthe character Daniel Zavitz was hit by a fire truck here during a chase scene in the Will Smith-Gene Hackman movie Enemy of the State. Directed by Tony Scott

properties.name: Cheaper by the Dozen house
properties.description: Posted by Marym 357 Lorraine Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90020Steve Martin\'s family (The Bakers) moved to this house that was supposed to be located in Evanston, IL, but it\'s actually in LA. Zestimate = ,211,102

properties.name: Crash house
properties.description: Posted by Marym 5177 Costello Ave, Sherman Oaks, CAThis is the house where Terrence Howard confronts the police after they\'ve pulled him over. He almost gets his head blown off. Zestimate = 51,875

properties.name: Father of the Bride house
properties.description: Posted by Marym 843 S. El Molino, Pasadena, CA 91106This is the home where George Banks and his family lived. Zestimate = ,881,736

properties.name: Fight Club: Raymond K Hessel's Liquor Store
properties.description: Posted by PhillThis was the liquor store where Raymond K Hessel worked in Fight Club (dir. David Fincher 1999). It also appeared in the 1980 Bette Midler movie, The Rose.

properties.name: Filming 'the Hunted', while running from Tommy Lee Jones, Benicio del Toro jumps into the Willamette off the MAX train
properties.description: Posted by Jake portlandNow, the MAX doesn\'t exactly run across the Hawthorne Bridge, they actually made a bus look like the train, and it was del Toro\'s stunt double that jumped.

properties.name: Ghost World: Bus stop
properties.description: Posted by PhillThe location of Enid\'s bus stop.

properties.name: Ghost World: Coffee shop
properties.description: Posted by Phill  This is the coffee shop where Enid and Rebecca sat at a chessboard table. A guy walked by and said, "You guys up for some reggae tonight?".

properties.name: Halloween House
properties.description: Posted by Marym 1537 N Orange Grove Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90046 Home where the movie Halloween was filmed. Zestimate = ,631,874

properties.name: Home from the movie ET
properties.description: Posted by Marym  7121 Lonzo St, Tujunga, CA 91042 This is the home where everyone\'s favorite alien lived in Elliot\'s closet. Zestimate = 55,589

properties.name: Invercargill; The World's Fastest Indian
properties.description: Posted by Keownnznew zealandHome of Burt Munro who is now immortalised by Anthony Hopkins in The World\'s Fastest Indian. Some of the movie was filmed there.

properties.name: Island fort in Mission: Impossible II
properties.description: Posted by LedenLa Perouse, Sydney AustraliaThis is the island fort that Tom Cruise had to infiltrate towards the end of Mission: Impossible II.

properties.name: Lost
properties.description: Posted by IanlineThe TV show Lost is filmed here. This is the beach where the set for the crashed plane is at. I was camping out on that beach next to it for a few nights.

properties.name: Mad Max 2
properties.description: Posted by Leden Silverton, AustraliaMad Max 2 was shot in the desert of Australia in a little town called Silverton which is just outside of Broken Hill (itself only a medium sized town).

properties.name: Marlon Brando in On the Waterfront (1954)
properties.description: Posted by Hive  DUMBO waterfront, Brooklyn, NYAn ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses. c. 2001 - Creative Time hosted an outdoor screening of this film in the historic area where it was filmed and situated, Down Under the Manhattan Bridge Overpass. This little park is a fantastic spot to soak in all the bustle.

properties.name: My Own Private Idaho - huddled in a doorway
properties.description: Posted by JasonSW 12th & Burnside, doorwayI don\'t know for sure, but everytime I go past this little isolated doorway, I think that it is the doorway from the film.

properties.name: Nightmare On Elm Street House
properties.description: Posted by Cantbesure 1428 N Genesee Ave West Hollywood, CA 90046-3930The house used for filming the original \'A Nightmare on Elm Street\' and featured in every sequel that followed in one form or another. Just north of Sunset and two streets west you\'ll find two of the \'Halloween\' houses.

properties.name: Nightmare on Elm Street house
properties.description: Posted by Marym 1428 N. Genesee Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90046This is where the movie was filmed. Zestimate = ,148,092

properties.name: Paper Street House
properties.description: Posted by PhillThis is where the exterior sets for the "Paper Street House" were built for the movie Fight Club.

properties.name: Quadrophenia (sex scene  alley)
properties.description: Posted by Lomokev Quadropheniabrighton is where most of the filming of Quadrophenia took place the clasic 1979 film where mods and rockers battle it out on brighton beach. the pin on the map points to where the allly bref sex scene took place

properties.name: Sleazy bar scene from Top Gun filmed here
properties.description: Posted by JasonHarbor Dr, San Diego, CAthat\'s it.

properties.name: The Cohen house from The OC
properties.description: Posted by Marym 6205 Ocean Breeze Dr, Malibu, CA 90265 This is the house where Seth, Ryan, Sandy and Kirsten live. Marissa first slept with Ryan in his pool house at the home, which wasn\'t yet built when the map photo was taken.

properties.name: The Exorcist Home
properties.description: Posted by Marym 3600 Prospect St NW, Washington, DC 20007 This is the Georgetown house where possessed Regan lived in the movie "The Exorcist." Market Assessed Value = ,089,770
